actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide special rules for the application of sections 4942 and 4943 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to any private foundation the principal asset of which is a bank holding company.

summary.text: Provides special rules for determining whether a private foundation's ownership interest in a bank holding company qualifies as an interest in a business enterprise, for purposes of the penalty tax on the excess business holdings of a private foundations. Extends the period for the required distribution of private foundation income for taxable years ending on or after June 30, 1974.

titles.title: A bill to provide special rules for the application of sections 4942 and 4943 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to any private foundation the principal asset of which is a bank holding company.
